title: STOMP
authors: Yan Zhu, Zachary Zimmerman, Nader Shakibay Senobari, Chin-Chia Michael Yeh, Gareth Funning, Abdullah Mueen, Philip Brisk, Eamonn Keogh

parameters.name: exclusion_zone
parameters.description: Size of the exclusion zone as a factor of the window_size. This prevents self-matches.

parameters.name: n_jobs
parameters.description: The number of jobs to run in parallel. `-1` is not supported, defaults back to serial implementation.

parameters.name: use_column_index
parameters.description: The column index to use as input for the univariate algorithm for multivariate datasets. The selected single channel of the multivariate time series is analyzed by the algorithms. The index is 0-based and does not include the index-column ('timestamp'). The single channel of an univariate dataset, therefore, has index 0.
